name: Arena Nationala
description: Arena Națională is a retractable roof football stadium in Bucharest, Romania. It opened in 2011 on the site of the original National Stadium, which was demolished between 2007 and 2008.

name: Form Space
description: Form Space is a concert hall in Cluj-Napoca, Romania. It is located in the city's main stadium, the Cluj Arena.

name: Expirat
description: Expirat is a concert hall in Bucharest, Romania. It is located in the city's main stadium, the National Arena.

name: Control Club
description: Control Club is popular nightspot with several spaces for live bands, DJs & dancing, plus a leafy garden terrace.

name: Romexpo
description: Romexpo, also known as Romexpo Dome or Romexpo Town, is a large exhibition center and indoor arena in Bucharest, Romania. It is primarily used for exhibitions, concerts, and sporting events.

name: Arenele Romane
description: Well-known music artists perform at this large, vibrant amphitheater with drinks for sale.

name: Underground Pub
description: Underground Pub is a concert hall in Iasi, Romania. It is located in the city's main stadium, the National Arena.

name: Hallenstadion
description: Hallenstadion is a multi-purpose stadium in Zurich, Switzerland. It is used mostly for football matches and is the home ground of FC Zürich. It is also used for other sports and music events.

name: Arena Geneve
description: Arena Geneva is a multi-purpose stadium in Geneva, Switzerland. It is used mostly for football matches and is the home ground of Servette FC. It is also used for other sports and music events.

name: Riverside
description: Riverside is a multi-purpose stadium in Aarburg, Switzerland. It is used mostly for football matches and is the home ground of FC Aarburg. It is also used for other sports and music events.
